name: Yatzy Online Complete
description:
This popular dice game is known by many names - Yatzy, Yahtzee, le Yams, Generala, Jatsi, Yacht - these are just some of them!

You can play Yatzy Online Complete with all of your Facebook friends and random people from all over the world, whichever device they use. The app offers you a real time gaming experience on your iPad, iPhone, or computer! Additionally, the app includes a game center that features high scores, leaderboards and different kinds of achievements.

For an even more fun gaming experience, Yatzy Online Complete offers you a training mode, cool personal statistics, full screen without advertisements and a possibility to choose from many colorful themes.

The rules for playing Yatzy Online Complete are very easy to learn and this totally addictive game is appropriate for all ages.

You have the possibility to play the 3 most popular variations of the game:

- 5 Dice International (The generally “accepted” rules for playing Yatzy)
- 5 Dice Scandinavian (This rule set is mostly played in the Scandinavian countries)
- 6 Dice version (This variant of the game is considered to be the most advanced one and will be loved by the ones looking for a greater challenge)

You can play Yatzy Online Complete online competing with others or offline without using the Internet - it’s up to you! Enjoy this classic dice game with your friends and family!

For any bug reports, enhancements or improvements ideas, send us an email to support@fictionalfactory.com
